attributes.additional_details: We need to take a stand and make our point heard, littering, dumping, destroying our environment will not be tolerated! The Croydon council and councils all over the country, need to take these issues on board and resolve these promptly before we no longer have a natural environment left, this is getting ridiculous, it needs to stop and it will stop! Sign this petition today and have your day on what we can do to MAKE A CHANGE🌍
attributes.background: Recently the Council have put limits on the use of dumps and they’ve removed bins from local areas, this has caused lots of littering to occur around our woodland areas, on street paths and in other people’s front/back garden which  is becoming a normality for people.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
